questions.question_original: Do you think there are more beautiful things now than in the past? Why?
questions.question_rewrite: Do you think there are more beautiful things today compared to the past? Why is that?
questions.question_cn: 你认为现在比过去有更多美好的事物吗？为什么？

questions.question_original: What beautiful scenery spots are there in your country?
questions.question_rewrite: Can you name some beautiful places in your country?
questions.question_cn: 你能列举一些你国家的美丽景点吗？

questions.question_original: Where do you think people usually come into contact with beautiful things?
questions.question_rewrite: Where do people usually see beautiful things in daily life?
questions.question_cn: 人们在日常生活中通常在哪里看到美好的事物？

questions.question_original: Why do you think people enjoy visiting beautiful places?
questions.question_rewrite: Why do people like going to beautiful places?
questions.question_cn: 为什么人们喜欢去美丽的地方？

questions.question_original: Do young people like to do sports?
questions.question_rewrite: Do many young people enjoy sports?
questions.question_cn: 很多年轻人喜欢运动吗？

questions.question_original: What are the benefits of sports for young people?
questions.question_rewrite: How does playing sports help young people?
questions.question_cn: 运动对年轻人有什么帮助？

questions.question_rewrite: Should cities have more public sports facilities?
questions.question_cn: 城市应该有更多的公共体育设施吗？

questions.question_rewrite: Is it a good idea for companies to donate sports facilities to poor kids?
questions.question_cn: 企业为贫困儿童捐赠体育设施是个好主意吗？

questions.question_rewrite: How do you usually handle a situation when you don't agree with someone?

questions.question_rewrite: What are some good ways to prevent a disagreement from turning into a serious conflict?
questions.question_cn: 有什么好方法可以防止分歧演变成严重的冲突？

questions.question_rewrite: What are some common things that parents and children often argue about?
questions.question_cn: 父母和孩子通常会因为什么事情发生争执？

questions.question_rewrite: How are buildings different in cities compared to rural areas?

questions.question_rewrite: Would you rather live in a city or the countryside, and why?
questions.question_cn: 你更愿意住在城市还是乡村？为什么？

questions.question_rewrite: What safety problems might people face in city apartment buildings?

questions.question_rewrite: Does it cost a lot to furnish and decorate a home where you live?

questions.question_rewrite: What outdoor sports or activities do many Chinese people enjoy?

questions.question_rewrite: Do you think people who enjoy risky activities tend to be more successful in life?

questions.question_rewrite: Is it a good idea to switch jobs when new opportunities come up?

questions.question_rewrite: Is it beneficial for young people to experience lots of different activities?

questions.question_rewrite: What kinds of TV shows are popular in your country?
questions.question_cn: 在你的国家，哪些类型的电视节目受欢迎？

questions.question_rewrite: Are international TV shows popular where you live?

questions.question_rewrite: Why might it be better for children to learn about animals through videos instead of zoo visits?

questions.question_rewrite: Is it common for teachers to use video materials in classrooms where you live?

questions.question_rewrite: What makes photography a popular way to remember special moments?

questions.question_rewrite: How can old photos help us understand history better?

questions.question_original: Is taking photos the best way to remember something?
questions.question_rewrite: Do you think photography is the most effective method for preserving memories?

questions.question_rewrite: Will people shop online more than in physical stores in the future? What makes you think so?
questions.question_cn: 你认为未来人们会更多地在网上购物而不是去实体店吗？你为什么这么认为？

questions.question_rewrite: Why do some people care so much about fashion and clothing styles?
questions.question_cn: 为什么有些人如此在意时尚和穿衣风格？

questions.question_rewrite: Is public transportation popular in your country? Why or why not?

questions.question_rewrite: What makes some people prefer a more relaxed and slower lifestyle?

questions.question_cn: 为什么耐心被认为是一种良好的品质？

questions.question_rewrite: Do you think people today are less patient than previous generations? What might explain this?

questions.question_rewrite: Which do you like better - reading books digitally or physical books? Why?

questions.question_rewrite: What types of stories are most popular with young children?

questions.question_rewrite: Do you think more people are starting to grow their own food these days?

questions.question_rewrite: What methods do busy people use to keep track of their tasks and appointments?

questions.question_cn: 你认为人们如果不想见某人，有时会故意'忘记'会议吗？为什么会这样做？

questions.question_rewrite: Should people continue using plastic items in daily life? Why or why not?

questions.question_rewrite: Why are childhood friendships valuable for kids' development?

questions.question_rewrite: What influences people's travel experiences and satisfaction?

questions.question_rewrite: How much does parental influence affect children's behavior?

questions.question_rewrite: Is humor important for teachers in the classroom?

questions.question_cn: 一个好老师应具备哪些品质？

questions.question_rewrite: What's more valuable in life - hands-on skills or book knowledge?

questions.question_original: Which age group is the best at learning new things?

questions.question_cn: 人们在哪个年龄段学习新知识最有效？

questions.question_rewrite: Do intelligent people tend to be happier in life?

questions.question_original: Do you think people tend to be selfish?

questions.question_rewrite: Between teachers and parents, who influences children's growth more significantly?

questions.question_original: Why are some children more intelligent than others?
questions.question_rewrite: What factors make certain children develop higher intelligence?

questions.question_original: What do you think of making friends online?

questions.question_original: Is it a good idea to make friends with people who are much older than you?
questions.question_rewrite: What are the benefits and drawbacks of having much older friends?
questions.question_cn: 交年长许多的朋友有哪些好处与不足？

questions.question_original: Do the people in your country enjoy meeting new people?
questions.question_rewrite: Are people in your country generally open to making new acquaintances?
questions.question_cn: 你国家的人是否普遍愿意结识新朋友？

questions.question_original: Do you think friendship is important?
questions.question_rewrite: How valuable are friendships in people's lives?
questions.question_cn: 你认为友谊在人们生活中有多重要？

questions.question_original: Why is it difficult for some people to make friends with others?
questions.question_rewrite: What challenges prevent certain people from forming friendships easily?
questions.question_cn: 哪些困难会阻碍一些人建立友谊？

questions.question_original: Do we benefit from having friends with different personalities?
questions.question_rewrite: What advantages come from having friends who are very different from us?
questions.question_cn: 拥有性格迥异的朋友有什么好处？

questions.question_original: What impact does advertising have on children and their parents?
questions.question_rewrite: How do commercials affect both kids and their parents?
questions.question_cn: 广告如何影响孩子和他们的父母？

questions.question_original: What do parents often persuade their children to do?
questions.question_rewrite: What things do parents typically encourage their kids to do?
questions.question_cn: 父母通常会鼓励孩子做哪些事情？

questions.question_original: Who do children listen to more, their parents or their teachers? Why?
questions.question_rewrite: Do kids pay more attention to parents or teachers? What's the reason?
questions.question_cn: 孩子更听父母的还是老师的？为什么？

questions.question_original: What are the good ways to persuade children?
questions.question_rewrite: What methods work best when trying to convince children?
questions.question_cn: 有哪些方法在说服孩子时最有效？

questions.question_original: What advice should young people follow?
questions.question_rewrite: What guidance is most valuable for teenagers?
questions.question_cn: 对青少年来说，哪些建议最有价值？

questions.question_original: What kind of plans do young people often make?
questions.question_rewrite: What types of plans are common among young adults?
questions.question_cn: 年轻人常见的计划类型有哪些？

questions.question_original: Why can't people always follow their plans?
questions.question_rewrite: What usually prevents people from sticking to their plans?
questions.question_cn: 人们通常因为什么无法坚持自己的计划？

questions.question_original: Why do people make plans?
questions.question_rewrite: What's the purpose of making plans in life?
questions.question_cn: 人们为什么要制定生活计划？

questions.question_original: Is it important to make plans?
questions.question_rewrite: How valuable is planning in daily life?
questions.question_cn: 在日常生活中，计划有多重要？

questions.question_original: Why do some people like to make plans while others don't like to?
questions.question_rewrite: What makes some people enjoy planning when others avoid it?
questions.question_cn: 为什么有些人喜欢计划，而有些人却避免做计划？

questions.question_original: Are there any people who never make plans?
questions.question_rewrite: Do some individuals really never plan anything?
questions.question_cn: 真的有些人从不做任何计划吗？

questions.question_original: What bad behavior do children usually have?
questions.question_rewrite: What are some common behavior problems in kids?
questions.question_cn: 孩子常见的不良行为有哪些？

questions.question_original: How should parents stop their children from behaving badly in public?
questions.question_rewrite: What's the best way for parents to handle children misbehaving in public?
questions.question_cn: 父母在面对孩子在公共场合行为不当时，最好的处理方式是什么？

questions.question_original: Are parents these days stricter than those in the past?
questions.question_rewrite: Is parenting today more strict compared to previous generations?
questions.question_cn: 现在的父母比过去的更严格吗？

questions.question_original: Whose influence on children is more important? Friends' or parents'?
questions.question_rewrite: Who impacts kids more - their friends or their parents?
questions.question_cn: 谁对孩子的影响更大——朋友还是父母？

questions.question_original: Should kids know more about stars and planets?
questions.question_rewrite: Is learning about space important for children?
questions.question_cn: 了解太空对孩子来说重要吗？

questions.question_original: Is high technology helpful for star watching?
questions.question_rewrite: How has modern technology improved astronomy?
questions.question_cn: 现代科技如何促进了天文学的发展？

questions.question_original: What kind of people are interested in stars?
questions.question_rewrite: Who tends to be most fascinated by astronomy?
questions.question_cn: 哪类人对天文学最感兴趣？

questions.question_original: Why do some people like to watch movies about stars or planets?
questions.question_rewrite: What makes space movies so appealing to certain people?
questions.question_cn: 为什么有些人特别喜欢关于太空的电影？

questions.question_original: Where do we often see advertisements?
questions.question_rewrite: What are the most common places we encounter ads?
questions.question_cn: 我们最常在哪些地方看到广告？

questions.question_original: What are the benefits of advertising?
questions.question_rewrite: How can advertising be helpful?
questions.question_cn: 广告能带来哪些好处？

questions.question_original: Are advertisements good or bad for children?
questions.question_rewrite: What effects do ads have on kids - positive or negative?
questions.question_cn: 广告对孩子是利大于弊还是弊大于利？

questions.question_original: How does advertising affect people?
questions.question_rewrite: In what ways do commercials influence consumers?
questions.question_cn: 广告通过哪些方式影响消费者？

questions.question_original: Do people pay attention to advertisements on public transport?
questions.question_rewrite: How effective are ads on buses and subways?
questions.question_cn: 公交和地铁上的广告效果如何？

questions.question_original: Do you think it is good to see the same advertisements everywhere?
questions.question_rewrite: Is repetitive advertising helpful or annoying?
questions.question_cn: 你觉得到处看到同样的广告是好还是烦？

questions.question_original: Do people in your country go to the shopping mall frequently?
questions.question_rewrite: Do people in your country often visit shopping malls?
questions.question_cn: 你们国家的人经常去购物中心吗？

questions.question_original: How have people's shopping habits changed in recent decades?
questions.question_rewrite: How has the way people shop changed in the last few decades?
questions.question_cn: 在过去几十年里，人们的购物方式发生了哪些变化？

questions.question_original: Do you think shops and shopping malls will disappear in the future?
questions.question_rewrite: Do you think shops and malls might stop existing in the future?
questions.question_cn: 你认为商店和购物中心在未来可能会消失吗？

questions.question_original: What are the differences between shopping in street markets and big shopping malls?
questions.question_rewrite: How is shopping at street markets different from shopping in big malls?
questions.question_cn: 在街市购物和在大型购物中心购物有什么不同？

questions.question_original: What are the differences in the shopping habits of different age groups?
questions.question_rewrite: How do shopping habits vary between younger and older people?
questions.question_cn: 不同年龄段的人在购物习惯上有哪些差异？

questions.question_original: What are the differences between shopping online and in-store?
questions.question_rewrite: How is online shopping different from shopping in a store?
questions.question_cn: 网上购物和实体店购物有哪些不同？

questions.question_original: Do people like comedy?
questions.question_rewrite: Do people enjoy watching comedy?
questions.question_cn: 人们喜欢看喜剧吗？

questions.question_original: Why do people of all ages like cartoons?
questions.question_rewrite: Why do people of all ages enjoy cartoons?
questions.question_cn: 为什么各个年龄段的人都喜欢看卡通片？

questions.question_original: Why do some people like to make others laugh?
questions.question_rewrite: Why do some people enjoy making others laugh?
questions.question_cn: 为什么有些人喜欢逗别人笑？

questions.question_original: Should teachers tell jokes in class?
questions.question_rewrite: Is it a good idea for teachers to tell jokes during class?
questions.question_cn: 老师在课堂上讲笑话是个好主意吗？

questions.question_original: Some people think it's a waste to buy too many clothes for children. What do you think?
questions.question_rewrite: Do you think buying lots of clothes for kids is a waste?
questions.question_cn: 你认为给孩子买太多衣服是一种浪费吗？

questions.question_original: How do people usually handle the clothes they don't want?
questions.question_rewrite: What do people usually do with clothes they no longer wear?
questions.question_cn: 人们通常如何处理不再穿的衣服？

questions.question_original: Why do people buy second-hand clothes?
questions.question_rewrite: Why do some people choose to buy used clothes?
questions.question_cn: 为什么有些人会选择购买二手衣物？

questions.question_original: What problems will occur if people don't recycle?
questions.question_rewrite: What problems can happen if people don’t recycle?
questions.question_cn: 如果人们不进行回收，会产生哪些问题？

questions.question_original: Should the government encourage people to recycle items?
questions.question_rewrite: Do you think the government should push people to recycle?
questions.question_cn: 你认为政府应该推动人们进行回收吗？

questions.question_original: How do people in your country recycle various items they don't want?
questions.question_rewrite: How do people in your country recycle things they no longer use?
questions.question_cn: 你们国家的人通常如何回收不再使用的物品？

questions.question_original: Do you think what people wear can influence their mood?
questions.question_rewrite: Do you think clothes can affect a person’s mood?
questions.question_cn: 你认为穿着会影响一个人的情绪吗？

questions.question_original: Do you think it is a good idea to buy clothes online?
questions.question_rewrite: Is buying clothes online a good idea, in your opinion?
questions.question_cn: 你觉得网购衣服是个好主意吗？

questions.question_original: What kind of clothes do people wear in the workplace?
questions.question_rewrite: What clothes do people usually wear to work?
questions.question_cn: 人们在工作场合通常穿什么样的衣服？

questions.question_original: What are the differences between clothes worn by old people and that by young people?
questions.question_rewrite: How do the clothes of older people differ from those of younger people?
questions.question_cn: 老年人和年轻人在穿衣风格上有哪些不同？

mixed_topics.topicName_cn: 孩子的观点与沟通能力

questions.question_original: What age do young children start to have their own opinions?
questions.question_rewrite: At what age do kids begin to form their own opinions?
questions.question_cn: 孩子从几岁开始有自己的看法？

questions.question_original: What kinds of things do children have strong opinions about?
questions.question_rewrite: What do children usually have strong opinions about?
questions.question_cn: 孩子通常会对哪些事情有强烈的看法？

questions.question_original: Should parents always consider their children’s opinions?
questions.question_rewrite: Do you think parents should always listen to their kids’ opinions?
questions.question_cn: 你认为父母应该总是听取孩子的意见吗？

questions.question_original: In which kinds of job are excellent communication skills essential?
questions.question_rewrite: What kinds of jobs really need great communication skills?
questions.question_cn: 哪些类型的工作特别需要出色的沟通能力？

questions.question_original: What is the importance of having good listening skills?
questions.question_rewrite: Why are good listening skills important?
questions.question_cn: 为什么拥有良好的倾听能力很重要？

questions.question_original: How easy it is for people to improve their communication skills?
questions.question_rewrite: Is it easy for people to get better at communication?
questions.question_cn: 人们提升沟通能力是否容易？

mixed_topics.topicName: Noise and quiet places in cities
mixed_topics.topicName_cn: 城市中的噪音与安静场所

questions.question_original: Is it hard to find quiet places in cities?
questions.question_rewrite: Is it difficult to find quiet spots in cities?
questions.question_cn: 在城市里找到安静的地方是否困难？

questions.question_original: Are there more or less quiet places compared to the past?
questions.question_rewrite: Are there fewer quiet places now than in the past?
questions.question_cn: 与过去相比，现在的安静场所是否更少了？

questions.question_original: What kinds of thing can make noise?
questions.question_rewrite: What kinds of things usually make noise?
questions.question_cn: 哪些东西通常会产生噪音？

questions.question_original: Do you think how noises in cities could be reduced?
questions.question_rewrite: How do you think city noise could be reduced?
questions.question_cn: 你认为城市的噪音可以如何减少？

questions.question_original: What do you think are the negative effects of noise pollution?
questions.question_rewrite: What bad effects can noise pollution have?
questions.question_cn: 你认为噪音污染会带来哪些负面影响？

questions.question_original: Do you think whether noises could be eliminated in the future?
questions.question_rewrite: Do you think it's possible to get rid of noise in the future?
questions.question_cn: 你认为未来有可能消除噪音吗？

mixed_topics.topicName: Setting goals in life and work
mixed_topics.topicName_cn: 生活与工作中的目标设定

questions.question_original: Do people in your country set goals?
questions.question_rewrite: Do people in your country like to set goals?
questions.question_cn: 你们国家的人喜欢设定目标吗？

questions.question_original: Do people usually set long-term goals or short-term ones?
questions.question_rewrite: Do people prefer setting long-term goals or short-term ones?
questions.question_cn: 人们更倾向于设立长期目标还是短期目标？

questions.question_original: Why is setting goals important in the workplace?
questions.question_rewrite: Why is it important to set goals at work?
questions.question_cn: 在职场中设立目标为什么很重要？

questions.question_original: What is the difference between goals set by old people and young people?
questions.question_rewrite: How are the goals of older people different from those of younger people?
questions.question_cn: 老年人和年轻人设定的目标有什么不同？

questions.question_original: How do people set goals?
questions.question_rewrite: How do people usually make plans to reach their goals?
questions.question_cn: 人们通常如何制定实现目标的计划？

questions.question_original: Do you think people should have personal life goals?
questions.question_rewrite: Do you think it's good to have personal goals in life?
questions.question_cn: 你认为拥有个人生活目标是一件好事吗？

mixed_topics.topicName_cn: 城市生活与乡村生活的对比

questions.question_original: What’s the difference between the city and the country?
questions.question_rewrite: How is life in the city different from life in the countryside?
questions.question_cn: 城市生活与乡村生活有何不同？

questions.question_original: Some people say large cities are suitable for old people. What do you think?
questions.question_rewrite: Do you think big cities are good places for older people to live?
questions.question_cn: 你认为大城市适合老年人居住吗？

questions.question_original: Do you think it is possible that all of the population move to cities?
questions.question_rewrite: Do you think everyone could move to cities in the future?
questions.question_cn: 你认为未来所有人都可能搬到城市里生活吗？

questions.question_original: Do you think people in the countryside are friendlier than people in the city?
questions.question_rewrite: Are people in rural areas usually friendlier than city people?
questions.question_cn: 你觉得乡村的人通常比城市的人更友好吗？

questions.question_original: What kind of music is popular in China now and what kind will be in the future?
questions.question_rewrite: What music is popular in China now, and what might be popular in the future?
questions.question_cn: 现在中国流行什么样的音乐，未来可能流行什么音乐？

questions.question_original: Why do some people like to listen to live music while others prefer CDs?
questions.question_rewrite: Why do some people enjoy live music more, while others like recorded music?
questions.question_cn: 为什么有些人更喜欢现场音乐，而另一些人则喜欢录制音乐？

questions.question_original: Do Chinese parents require their children to learn to play musical instruments?
questions.question_rewrite: Do parents in China often want their kids to learn a musical instrument?
questions.question_cn: 中国的家长是否常常希望孩子学习乐器？

questions.question_original: How do you think the government could support very talented musicians?
questions.question_rewrite: How can the government help really talented musicians?
questions.question_cn: 政府可以如何帮助非常有才华的音乐家？

questions.question_original: Do you think it is valuable to hold international music events?
questions.question_rewrite: Is it a good idea to host international music events?
questions.question_cn: 举办国际音乐活动是一个好主意吗？

questions.question_original: Do you think a country's music can boost its international reputation?
questions.question_rewrite: Can music help a country build a good image around the world?
questions.question_cn: 音乐能否帮助一个国家在国际上树立良好形象？

questions.question_original: What are the differences between indoor sports and outdoor sports?
questions.question_rewrite: How are indoor and outdoor sports different?
questions.question_cn: 室内运动和户外运动有哪些不同？

questions.question_original: Which outdoor sports are popular in China?
questions.question_rewrite: What outdoor sports are popular in China?
questions.question_cn: 在中国哪些户外运动比较受欢迎？

questions.question_original: Which sports are popular among elderly people?
questions.question_rewrite: What sports do older people usually like?
questions.question_cn: 年长者通常喜欢哪些运动？

questions.question_original: Which outdoor sports are popular with children?
questions.question_rewrite: What outdoor sports do kids usually enjoy?
questions.question_cn: 孩子们通常喜欢哪些户外运动？

questions.question_original: How do weather affect outdoor sports?
questions.question_rewrite: How does the weather affect outdoor sports?
questions.question_cn: 天气如何影响户外运动？

questions.question_original: Which sports can children do on rainy days?
questions.question_rewrite: What sports can kids play when it's raining?
questions.question_cn: 下雨天孩子们可以做哪些运动？

questions.question_original: What kinds of sports events are broadcast on TV or other media in your country?
questions.question_rewrite: What kinds of sports are shown on TV or online in your country?
questions.question_cn: 在你的国家，哪些体育赛事会在电视或网络媒体上播放？

questions.question_original: Do people in your country enjoy watching football games?
questions.question_rewrite: Do people in your country like watching football?
questions.question_cn: 你所在国家的人喜欢看足球吗？

questions.question_original: Does encouragement and applause from the audience have an impact on athletes?
questions.question_rewrite: Does cheering from the crowd affect athletes' performance?
questions.question_cn: 观众的鼓励和掌声会影响运动员的表现吗？

questions.question_original: Do you prefer to watch live sports or watch it on TV?
questions.question_rewrite: Do you prefer watching sports live or on TV?
questions.question_cn: 你更喜欢现场看体育比赛还是通过电视观看？

questions.question_original: Why do some people like to watch live sports?
questions.question_rewrite: Why do some people enjoy watching sports in person?
questions.question_cn: 为什么有些人喜欢亲自观看体育比赛？

questions.question_original: What kinds of sports do Chinese people like to watch?
questions.question_rewrite: What sports do people in China like to watch?
questions.question_cn: 中国人喜欢看哪些体育项目？

questions.question_original: Do you think competition is good for students?
questions.question_rewrite: Do you think it's good for students to face competition?
questions.question_cn: 你认为学生面对竞争是一件好事吗？

questions.question_original: What can governments do to improve people’s health?
questions.question_rewrite: What can the government do to help people stay healthy?
questions.question_cn: 政府可以做些什么来帮助人们保持健康？

questions.question_original: How can people keep fit?
questions.question_rewrite: What can people do to stay in shape?
questions.question_cn: 人们可以做些什么来保持身材？

questions.question_original: How can you tell whether a website is reliable or not?
questions.question_rewrite: How do you know if a website is trustworthy?
questions.question_cn: 你怎么判断一个网站是否可靠？

questions.question_original: Do you think people are healthier now than in the past?
questions.question_rewrite: Are people healthier now than they were in the past?
questions.question_cn: 你认为现在人们比过去更健康吗？

questions.question_original: Who should be responsible for the exaggerated claims that are on the supplement packaging?
questions.question_rewrite: Who should take the blame for false claims on supplement labels?
questions.question_cn: 谁应为保健品标签上的虚假宣传负责？

questions.question_original: How much healthier people are nowadays compared to those in the past?
questions.question_rewrite: Are people a lot healthier now than in the past?
questions.question_cn: 与过去相比，如今人们健康了多少？

questions.question_original: Do you think arguments are important?
questions.question_rewrite: Do you think having arguments is important?
questions.question_cn: 你认为争执重要吗？

questions.question_original: What do family members usually have arguments about?
questions.question_rewrite: What do family members often argue about?
questions.question_cn: 家庭成员通常会因为什么争吵？

questions.question_original: Is it easier for you to have arguments with your family or with your friends?
questions.question_rewrite: Is it easier to argue with family or with friends?
questions.question_cn: 你觉得和家人还是朋友更容易产生争执？

questions.question_original: Do you think people should change the way they think when having arguments?
questions.question_rewrite: Should people try to change their mindset during arguments?
questions.question_cn: 你认为人们在争执中应该调整自己的思维方式吗？
